Description.Text: Premier Hotel is a traditional 3-star property offering comfortable accommodation in the heart of Ekaterinburg. Highlights include a cafe and free Wi-Fi. Ekaterinburg city centre is a vibrant district situated besides the Iset River and steeped in fascinating history. Nearby places of interest include City Hall, the Opera & Ballet House and the Cathedral-on-the-Blood, the site of the former Ipatiev House where the Romanov royal family spent their last months. Ploshchad 1905 goda metro station provides fast and easy access to other popular Ekaterinburg destinations. The hotel is housed in a 20th-century mid-rise building. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are spacious and decorated in a traditional style. Amenities include a satellite/cable TV, mini-bar, air-conditioning, bathrobes and slippers. The en-suite bathrooms feature a walk-in shower or a bathtub with integrated shower. The Premier cafe-club serves European cuisine. Guests can also enjoy a range of drinks at the hotel bar. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel has a 24-hour reception.
